elements.title: fleet faction (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Katō Kanji (pictured), leader of the fleet faction, shouted that "war with America starts now" after the signing of the Washington Naval Treaty?

elements.title: Ashes to Ashes (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the music video for David Bowie's "Ashes to Ashes" was, at a cost of £250,000, the most expensive made at the time?

elements.title: Jack Champion (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Jack Champion had to film all his scenes in Avatar: The Way of Water twice?

elements.title: The Dance of the Twisted Bull (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a model walked the runway at the Alexander McQueen show The Dance of the Twisted Bull in a flamenco dress pierced with spears?

elements.title: the Brooklyn Tower (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Brooklyn Tower, the first supertall building in Brooklyn, was described as the "Empire State Building of Brooklyn"?

elements.title: The Mercian Sphere (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that according to a critic, the black metal album The Mercian Sphere is not folk metal, but close enough for "black metal purists" to reject it?

elements.title: Nana Nuriana (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that when West Java governor Nana Nuriana ran for reelection in 1998, he faced fifteen challengers?

elements.title: Lego fandom (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that members of Lego fandom not only design their own sets but also engage in cosplay?
